# UIScrollType.continuous

**Case**

A continuous scroll type that originates from a device like a trackpad.

## Declaration

```swift
case continuous
```

## Constants

- **UIScrollType.discrete**: A discrete scroll type that originates from a device like a mouse with a scroll wheel.

items.description: A discrete scroll type that originates from a device like a mouse with a scroll wheel.
items.name: UIScrollType.discrete
